name: SimCardOrderGet
description: Get a single SIM card order by its ID.

$ul: **data**
**cost**: An object representing the total cost of the order.
**amount**: A string representing the cost amount.
**currency**: Filter by ISO 4217 currency string.
**created_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date-time indicating when the resource was last created.
**id**: Identifies the resource.
**order_address**: An object representing the address information from when the order was submitted.
**administrative_area**: State or province where the address is located.
**country_code**: The mobile operator two-character (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) origin country code.
**extended_address**: Supplemental field for address information.
**id**: Uniquely identifies the address for the order.
**locality**: The name of the city where the address is located.
**postal_code**: Postal code for the address.
**street_address**: The name of the street where the address is located.
**quantity**: The amount of SIM cards requested in the SIM card order.
**record_type**: Identifies the type of the resource.

**status**: The current status of the SIM Card order.
  • pending - the order is waiting to be processed.
  • processing - the order is currently being processed.
  • ready_to_ship - the order is ready to be shipped to the specified address.
  • shipped - the order was shipped and is on its way to be delivered to the specified address.
  • delivered - the order was delivered to the specified address.
**tracking_url**: The URL used to get tracking information about the order.
**updated_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date-time indicating when the resource was last updated.
